dcterms:creator: X. Fu
J. Zhang
Z. Meng
I. King
dcterms:description: IMDb is an online database about movies and television programs, including information such as cast, production crew, and plot summaries. The dataset used contains 4278 movies, 2081 directors, and 5257 actors, with the task of predicting the genre of a movie based on its features.
dcterms:title: IMDb

dcterms:creator: M. Ji
Y. Sun
M. Danilevsky
J. Han
J. Gao
dcterms:description: DBLP is a computer science bibliography website. The dataset used contains 4057 authors, 14328 papers, 7723 terms, and 20 publication venues, with the task of predicting the research area of an author based on their publication history.
dcterms:title: DBLP

dcterms:description: A family of synthetic datasets created to mimic the schema of real-world applications, designed for the task of predicting the class of a target node type with controllable complexity.
dcterms:title: Synthetic
